TopicTitle: Activating mechjeb without putting on the part

Articles.Content: I was wondering if there was a way to have MechJeb active for all craft all the time without having to put on that frankly ridiculous giant green glowing radio thing part on your craft?
What magic is this?! It works! Thanks guys ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> What magic is this?

The magic of [Module Manager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55219-1-0-x-Module-Manager-2-6-3-%28May-4%29-Bonsai-Trimming-Kit-Edition) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) It really is the [Swiss Army knife](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swiss_Army_knife) of KSP. It's usually much easier and safer to use this to modify existing parts or create new ones than doing it from scratch.
